name: Cittalia Fondazione ANCI sulle politiche sociali per l'accoglienza, l'integrazione e la cittadinanza
membership: Cittalia is the Foundation of the National Association of Italian Municipalities (ANCI) dedicated to social policies on reception, integration and citizenship.
goal:
Cittalia Fondazione ANCI is the Foundation of the National Association of Italian Municipalities (ANCI) dedicated to social policies on reception, integration and citizenship.
It promotes and shares a culture of reception, integration and citizenship, contributing to reinforce the role of cities in implementing social policies of inclusioni/integration.
To achieve its goals, Cittalia can:
- promote, organize, coordinate conferences, seminars, studies and reports, make actions of assistance, consulting, formation, and communication to municipalities
- promote and coordinate programmes on welfare, social inclusion and migratory policies, in order to help local administrations to define policies of inclusion/integration in particular dedicated to people risking social marginalization
- cooperate with other national organization or association, Insitutes, Foundations, to create platforms of relations aiming at reinforcing urban governance and the role of cities
- make publications

In 2011 by the integration of the Protection System for Asylum Seekers and Refugees (SPRAR)
into its organizing structure, Cittalia has been involved actively into the study and management of the reception and integration policies in Italy.

The Protection System for Asylum Seekers and Refugees is actually the Italian network for the reception and integration of people seeking and granted international protection
The System is based on collaboration between the centralised institutions, the Ministry of Internal Affairs, ANCI and local authorities, with the involvement of the local associations and NGOs
